searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> TokenBucket.new( capacity: number, refillRate: number ) → () Creates a new TokenBucket with a specified capacity and refill rate. The TokenBucket will start out initially with the capacity given.

searchDocs.title: add​
searchDocs.content: </> TokenBucket:add() → () Adds tokens based on the refill rate. This should be called on an interval such as every second.

searchDocs.title: remove​
searchDocs.content: </> TokenBucket:remove() → boolean Attempts to remove a token. Returns a boolean to represent whether a token was removed or not.
